content.prompt: A student in a classroom sees a tree outside that is far from the classroom window and uses a concave mirror to form an image of the tree on a screen. Which of the following best describes the image?

choices.label: Real and near the center of curvature of the mirror
Real and near the focal point of the mirror
Virtual and near the center of curvature of the mirror
Virtual and near the focal point of the mirror

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
